com.diffplug.common.swt.dnd

Class CustomDragImageListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diffplug.common.swt.dnd.CustomDragImageListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, DragSourceListener, SWTEventListener

    public abstract class CustomDragImageListener
extends Object
implements DragSourceListener
    Custom implementation of a local transfer class. The "data" object will be this Transfer itself.
